thread.title: Pronger jokes he fined himself $5 for Bieber hit
thread.title_full: Pronger jokes he fined himself $5 for Bieber hit

author: USA TODAY
title: Pronger jokes he fined himself $5 for Bieber hit
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Pronger jokes he fined himself $5 for Bieber hit More Justin Bieber jokes! Post to Facebook Pronger jokes he fined himself $5 for Bieber hit More Justin Bieber jokes! Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/chris-pronger-jokes-five-dollar-fine-justin-bieber-crush-boards-smash-nhl-celebrity-shootout-funny-photo/ Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Pronger jokes he fined himself $5 for Bieber hit Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 9:53 p.m. ET Feb. 2, 2017 
Justin Bieber got hilariously crushed against the boards by a giddy Chris Pronger last Saturday during the NHL All-Star Celebrity Shootout. While Bieber declined to talk to media after the game, Pronger joked about what happened (again) on Thursday. 
Pronger, who works for the NHL's Department of Player Safety, joked that he fined himself $5 during a one-man hearing. 
More from The AP : 
Pronger's grin captured in the photo made it seem like he had one of the happiest hits in his hockey career. 
"I wouldn't go that far," Pronger said. "Certainly getting a lot of mileage out of a photo, that's for sure." 
Justin Bieber got crushed. (Photo: AP) 
Pronger had jokes when reporters asked him about this on Saturday after the game too. Here's what he said then, per the St. Louis Post-Dispatch : 
"A player of his caliber, you've got to take away his time and space," Pronger told the Post-Dispatch. "You don't want to have anybody that has those kinds of dance moves to have any space." 
"I gave him a little back massage with my stick, pinned him up against the boards, rubbed his face in the glass and just gave him a little welcome to the NHL," Pronger said. "I wouldn't even call it a hit. Had I hit him, it would have been probably a different picture because he can't weigh more than 120 pounds." 
For the record, according to a site called healthyceleb.com , Bieber is 5-foot-9 and 145.5 pounds. Pronger, on the other hand, is listed at 6-foot-6 and 220 pounds. 
I should also note that Bieber did score during the game, though Cuba Gooding Jr. claimed it took the singer 25 attempts. Cuba Gooding Jr. on Justin Bieber's goal at NHL Celebrity game: "Yeah, 25 shots later. Thank God, he might've killed himself." pic.twitter.com/6OkMjKBg4J â€” Alysha Tsuji (@AlyshaTsuji) January 29, 2017 
Bieber took a lot of shots that day. Hopefully he had fun. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/chris-pronger-jokes-five-dollar-fine-justin-bieber-crush-boards-smash-nhl-celebrity-shootout-funny-photo/ Most Popular
